body_html: Okay. I managed to build TensorFlow at 86e11d2 with some minor local changes. Now, the modified test case that I posted earlier consistently segfaults within CopyGPUTensorToCPU(). This segfault issue might only affect macOS+GPU, as this is not officially supported. Maybe someone can test Linux+GPU or Windows+GPU?
body_text: Okay. I managed to build TensorFlow at 86e11d2 with some minor local changes. Now, the modified test case that I posted earlier consistently segfaults within CopyGPUTensorToCPU(). This segfault issue might only affect macOS+GPU, as this is not officially supported. Maybe someone can test Linux+GPU or Windows+GPU?
body: Okay. I managed to build TensorFlow at 86e11d29dc76a09ff8bbc0b426ca78c98946bf23 with some minor local changes. Now, the [modified test case that I posted earlier](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/9518#issuecomment-366854122) consistently segfaults within CopyGPUTensorToCPU(). This segfault issue might only affect macOS+GPU, as this is not officially supported. Maybe someone can test Linux+GPU or Windows+GPU?
